title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 573.2 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 573.2 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is an attempt to gain an
orderly pattern of motor vehicle control. A smoothly functioning traffic plan
will do much to alleviate problems inherent in our growing college
community. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
573.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
